common.ourStoryDesc: Providing comprehensive fiber optic network solutions to meet the needs of all types of businesses
common.ourStoryTitle: From HKT Engineering to Independent Innovation
common.ourStorySubtitle: A New Chapter in Hong Kong Digital Infrastructure

ourStoryContent.paragraph1: FiberLink was originally the engineering department of HKT, Hong Kong leading telecommunications provider. In June 2024, a significant milestone was reached when HKT indirect wholly-owned subsidiary entered into a sale and purchase agreement with investors, marking the beginning of FiberLink journey as an independent company.
ourStoryContent.paragraph2: The transaction, valued at US$870 million, represents a strategic move to unlock the value of HKT extensive passive network business by introducing long-term investment partners. This partnership enables the sharing of future capital expenditures related to expanding network infrastructure to support business growth.
ourStoryContent.paragraph3: As Hong Kong new residential developments are planned, enterprise digital transformation accelerates, and Greater Bay Area integration deepens, FiberLink will work alongside HKT and investors to expand its passive infrastructure business, supporting new service launches and expansion into new regions.
ourStoryContent.paragraph4: This strategic move allows HKT to strengthen its resources to enhance and broaden its consumer services, particularly in supporting digital lifestyle applications, while providing innovative and advanced technological solutions to enterprise customers.

common.ourStoryShort: FiberLink originated as the engineering department of HKT. In June 2024, we became an independent company through a major investment, unlocking new opportunities to expand Hong Kong's digital infrastructure. Today, FiberLink partners with HKT and leading investors to deliver advanced, reliable fiber network solutions for the city's future.
common.successStoriesDesc: See how our fiber optic solutions have transformed businesses across various industries
common.testimonialsDesc: Hear what our clients have to say about our fiber optic solutions and services

service1.title: Professional Fiber Installation
service1.description: Our expert team plans and installs high-speed fiber optic networks for your business, ensuring optimal performance and reliability

service2.title: Enterprise Network Solutions

caseStudy1.title: Submarine Cable
caseStudy1.heading: World First Ultra-High Core Count Digital Submarine Cable
caseStudy1.description: We have successfully deployed the Ultra Express Link (UEL), the world first submarine cable equipped with 2,016 optical fiber cores, directly connecting the data centers in Tseung Kwan O and Chai Wan.
caseStudy1.imageAlt: IT professional monitoring network performance in a modern data center

points.1: Ultra-high capacity with 2,016 optical fiber cores
points.2: The shortest submarine cable path of only 2.76 km

caseStudy2.title: Lamma Island
caseStudy2.heading: Lamma Island Fibre Network Coverage Project
caseStudy2.description: We have successfully built a fibre network on Lamma Island, offering residents their first residential high-speed broadband experience. The network is expected to cover 19 villages on the island within this year, delivering symmetrical speeds of up to 10Gbps.

caseStudy3.title: 800G AI Superhighway
caseStudy3.heading: 800G AI Superhighway
caseStudy3.description: FiberLink 800G AI Superhighway service is purpose-built for AI, high-performance computing, cloud, and data center interconnection. It meets the high-bandwidth demands of the new era, enabling data flow and computing power convergence in the age of AI and supercomputing.

points.2: Scalable AI computing integration and expansion
points.3: Supports supercomputing centers, science parks, tech enterprises, and universities

testimonial1.quote: FiberLink enterprise network solution transformed our operations. The speed and reliability have been exceptional, and their support team is always responsive.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.quote: We needed a network that could handle massive data transfers for our research projects. FiberLink delivered a solution that exceeded our expectations and scaled with our needs.
testimonial2.author: Dr. Michael Wong

testimonial3.quote: The reliability of our network is critical for patient care. Since implementing FiberLink solution, we had zero downtime and significantly improved our digital healthcare services.
testimonial3.author: Jennifer Lau

aboutPage.missionVisionDesc: Driving Hong Kong's digital infrastructure development and providing the most reliable fiber optic network solutions for enterprises
aboutPage.missionText: To provide Hong Kong enterprises with the most advanced and reliable fiber optic network infrastructure, supporting digital transformation and business growth, becoming Hong Kong's leading enterprise fiber optic network service provider.
aboutPage.visionText: To become the most trusted enterprise fiber optic network solution partner in the Greater Bay Area and Asia-Pacific region, driving digital economic development and connecting a better future.
aboutPage.excellenceText: Maintaining the highest standards of network quality and service levels to ensure stable operation and sustainable development of customer businesses.
aboutPage.customerFirstText: Centering on customer needs, providing personalized solutions and professional technical support services.
aboutPage.innovationText: Continuously investing in technological innovation and R&D, leading industry development and creating greater value for customers.
aboutPage.readyToStartDesc: Let us provide the most suitable fiber optic network solution for your enterprise

technicalCards.backhaulDesc: Optimized fibre backhaul for 5G, ensuring ultra-low latency, high reliability, and seamless coverage expansion for next-generation mobile networks.
technicalCards.hollowDesc: Hollow fiber, as the name suggests, is a filtration membrane formed into hollow tubes. The filtrate flows through the center of the hollow fiber, and large and small molecules are separated using the principle of Tangential Flow Filtration (TFF).

fibreTechnologies.title: Fibre Technologies
fibreTechnologies.desc: Leading-edge fibre technologies supporting Hong Kong's digital infrastructure
fibreTechnologies.100g400g800gDesc: Ultra-high capacity optical transmission supporting massive data, cloud, and AI workloads for enterprises and carriers. Enables future-proof backbone and metro networks.

800gDetails.title: 800G AI Superhighway
800gDetails.subtitle: Asia's First 800Gbps Wide Area Network for AI and Supercomputing
800gDetails.description: FiberLink's 800Gbps AI Superhighway is a dedicated, fibre-based private network that provides super high-speed, ultra-low latency, reliable and highly secure network connections. It is designed to meet the increasing demand from businesses and institutions for advanced supercomputing capabilities driven by AI, machine learning, cloud services, edge computing and other data-intensive applications.

features.robustProtection: Robust Protection: Private circuit ensuring robust security for sensitive data transfers
features.enhancedProductivity: Enhanced Productivity: Unmatched speed enabling real-time data processing
features.scalability: Scalability: Easy bandwidth upgrades and rapid deployment of new AI services
features.highReliability: High Reliability: Superior reliability with robust redundancy and failover mechanisms
features.costEffectiveness: Cost Effectiveness: Consolidating multiple connections into single ultra-speed link

800gDetails.applications: Enables rapid transfer of large datasets for LLM-based AI model training and supports AI inference applications utilising high-performance computing resources, such as genomics and scientific simulations, and AI agent assist and virtual agents in contact centres.
